episode_summary: This episode covers a range of fascinating topics including the use of guinea pig testicles as early performance enhancers in baseball, a Welsh power station that activates during TV advert breaks, ancient butterfly-like insects, and a robot monk in a Chinese Buddhist temple.

facts.fact: The first performance enhancing drug to be used in baseball was pulverized guinea pig testicles.
There is a power station buried inside a Welsh mountain that only turns on during TV advert breaks.
85 million years before butterflies existed, there was another animal that looked and acted exactly the same as butterflies.
The Longquan Buddhist Temple in China has a monk called Worthy Stupid Robot Monk.
